meta.title: Symbiosis
meta.d:tDo: Add support for book format to the XML format. Book format means in this context, that a set of documents has a specific natural order, which can be used to render set documents as a book. This provides a reading flow, so that the user can read all documents as one without complex navigation. This is mostly useful for projects, that are books or similar.

article.paragraph: Some may define Symbiosis as living together, but what does this mean? Why is it so hard to define, but so easy to grasp?
